name: Medusa
description: Medusa mixes smooth, sweet flavors with an earthy aroma of fresh blueberries to create a compelling hybrid. Using their strain Misty, Nirvana Seeds has developed a strong mix of sedating body effects with balanced and clear cerebral activity. Medical consumers appreciate Medusa’s ability to combat sleep issues and body pains.
descriptionPlain: Medusa mixes smooth, sweet flavors with an earthy aroma of fresh blueberries to create a compelling hybrid. Using their strain Misty, Nirvana Seeds has developed a strong mix of sedating body effects with balanced and clear cerebral activity. Medical consumers appreciate Medusa’s ability to combat sleep issues and body pains.

highlightedReviews.text: This stuff hits you in under a minute. The smoke itself is very smooth although after you exhale, the coughing is almost inevitable. You’ll start feeling the pressure build behind your nose and the couch-lock comes shortly after. Dam, my arm feels like wooden blocks right now. Now, my legs…I’m like that old man pirate dude with the wooden everything in Family Guy. I’ve noticed my breathing has gotten extremely slow. This is very calm, relaxing ganja; great for anxiety and relieving stress. I feel like I’m going to be passing out soon so I’ll try to do this as concisely as I can. Umm, taste is rather standard; didn’t notice any really obvious flavors that stuck out. Sorry to all the connoisseurs, no wow-factor here. The pre-smoke scent was somewhat mild with hints of sweet and sour scented leaves. The high isn’t overly stimulating like those found in many saliva’s; it is more…peaceful, serene.
Not my favorite strain ever, but still pretty good. It seemed smoother and definitely had a sweet taste. The high was good and very relaxing.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Medusa, Purple Chemdawg, Emerald Jack, American Kush, and Key Lime Pie
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The much-needed weekend has almost arrived, which means it's about time to snuggle up with your favorite relaxing indica or get out and see the world with a nice, uplifting sativa. Whichever you prefer, we've added new options for you to explore, rate, and review! Here are five of the most in-demand strains according to your requests via the Leafly app, but be sure to check out other new additions here.
   1. Medusa
Characteristics of Medusa:

Hybrid strain
Derived from Misty genetics
Breeder: Nirvana Seeds
Sweet, earthy blueberry aroma
Sedating body effects with clear-headed cerebral activity
May help with sleep issues and body pains

   2. Purple Chemdawg
Characteristics of Purple Chemdawg:

75/25 indica-dominant strain
Cross between Chemdawg and Granddaddy Purple 
Sweet grape aroma
Weighs heavy on the body, but leaves the mind free to wander creative, introspective realms
May help with chronic pain, stress, and anxiety

   3. Emerald Jack
Characteristics of Emerald Jack:

70/30 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Jack Herer and Emerald OG
Pine, skunk, and citrus flavors
Effects are uplifting, energetic, and creative

   4. American Kush
Characteristics of American Kush:

70/30 indica-dominant strain
Cross between Pre-98 Bubba Kush and Sin City Kush
Breeder: Alphakronik Genes
Delivers relaxing body effects
Lemon, spicy, lavender, and coffee flavors
May help with muscle spasms, chronic pain, and nausea

   5. Key Lime Pie
Characteristics of Key Lime Pie:

Hybrid strain
GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) phenotype
Breeder: Burning Bush Nurseries
Produces relaxing body effects
Lime candy, mint, and spice aroma
May help with pain and insomnia
